name: Mostly Safe Bunker
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE

YOU NEED TO HAVE YOUR CAMERA VISIBLE TO PLAY THIS GAME

IT USES 6DOF INSIDE OUT TRACKING WHICH MEANS IF THE CAMERA IS BLOCKED IT WILL NOT WORK

You also need to be able to use arcore if you can't use it then you unfortunately can't play the game. The tracking also works best in good lighting conditions but because it's designed to work with only one camera it does still have some issues.

Mostly Safe Bunker is a simple resource management game where you push buttons to generate resources and gather enough that you can focus on making a cure to a disease affecting the world. This game was made in 2 days for the Stay Safe Jam and there's a lot that I would like to change to improve it(I might make a better version in the future with more time to work on it.) I wanted to have this on pc too but for some reason it wont work, i've spent 4 and half hours trying to figure out why and made no progress, so maybe I'll add that later if I find a way to fix it. The android version is, to my knowledge the first mobile vr game that has 6 degrees of freedom without extra hardware but please correct me if thats wrong.
